
def isPalin(k):
	i = 0
	j = len(k)-1
	
	palin = True
	
	while i<=j :
		if k[i] != k[j] :
			palin = False
			break
		i+=1
		j-=1
	return palin

def getRvrs(n):
	
	n = list(str(n))
	i = 0
	j = len(n)-1
	
	while i<=j :
		c = n[i]
		n[i] = n[j]
		n[j] = c
		i+=1
		j-=1
	
	return int("".join(n))
	
def func(n) :
	
	rvrs = getRvrs(n)
	
	itratns = 1
	final = n + rvrs
	
	while isPalin(str(final)) == False :
		n = final
		rvrs = getRvrs(n)
		final = n+rvrs
		itratns+=1
	
	print itratns , final
	
def main():
	
	T = int(raw_input())
	while T :
		n = int(raw_input())
		func(n)
		T-=1
	
	
main()
